data.enText: time that is spent doing what you enjoy when you are not working or studying

data.chText: 如今我们有更多的钱和空闲时间来享受了。
data.enText: These days we have more money and more leisure to enjoy it.
leisure activities/interests/pursuits
at leisure
with no particular activities; free

data.chText: 下午到城中心区玩儿去吧。
data.enText: Spend the afternoon at leisure in the town centre.
without hurrying

data.chText: 咱们吃午饭吧，边吃边谈。
data.enText: Let's have lunch so we can talk at leisure.
at your leisure
when you have the time to do sth without hurrying

data.chText: 我建议你把表格带回去有空慢慢看。
data.enText: I suggest you take the forms away and read them at your leisure.
a gentleman/lady of leisure

data.chText: 不必工作的男子（或女子）
data.enText: a man/woman who does not have to work

ex.chText: 怀特夫人过着安逸的生活。
ex.enText: Mrs. White leads a life of ease.
He was sitting in his chair at ease.

synonyms.bx: 指因没有担心、忧虑等而轻松悠闲的状态。

ex.chText: 我们酒店提供高标准的舒适住宿和服务。
ex.enText: Our hotel offers a high standard of comfort and service.

ex.chText: 史密斯一家现在过着比较安逸的生活。
ex.enText: The Smiths are now living in relative comfort.

synonyms.bx: 指身体上的舒适或在物质上应有尽有的安逸生活状态。

ex.chText: 闲暇时我喜欢去看电影。
ex.enText: I like to go to the cinema when I have leisure time.

ex.chText: 我可以在家慢慢再读一遍。
ex.enText: I can read it again at leisure at home.

ex.chText: 如今，生活被分成工作和休闲两部分。
ex.enText: Life today is divided into work and leisure.

synonyms.bx: 尤指闲暇时间或悠闲状态。

data.enText: at leisure
with no particular activities; free

data.chText: 下午到城中心区玩儿去吧。
data.enText: Spend the afternoon at leisure in the town centre.
without hurrying

data.chText: 咱们吃午饭吧，边吃边谈。
data.enText: Let's have lunch so we can talk at leisure.
at your leisure
when you have the time to do sth without hurrying

data.chText: 我建议你把表格带回去有空慢慢看。
data.enText: I suggest you take the forms away and read them at your leisure.
a gentleman/lady of leisure

data.chText: 不必工作的男子（或女子）
data.enText: a man/woman who does not have to work

tr: freedom to choose a pastime or enjoyable activity
example: he lacked the leisure for golf

tr: time available for ease and relaxation
example: his job left him little leisure

value.def: Leisure is the time when you are not working and you can relax and do things that you enjoy.

example.ex: ...a relaxing way to fill my leisure time.
example.tran: 我打发空余时间的轻松办法

example.ex: ...one of Britain's most popular leisure activities.
example.tran: 英国最受欢迎的休闲活动之一

value.def: If someone does something at leisure or at their leisure, they enjoy themselves by doing it when they want to, without hurrying.

example.ex: You will be able to stroll at leisure through the gardens...
He could read all the national papers at his leisure.
example.tran: 他可以悠然阅读所有的全国性报纸。

value.tran: 从容不迫；不慌不忙；慢悠悠

trans: 从容不迫；不慌不忙；慢悠悠
休闲产业；休闲服务业；休闲业
休闲中心；体育娱乐中心；休闲理疗中心；休闲区
休闲服；休闲装；家居服；便服
